entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 1.3.5.3530
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 85e62caccfd6df7331f0551efce6a99e9b355b89 Fix tests for ImportListSyncService
  • 78610ff6eed7047b7c50e9dbdb8018afe7dadf5e Use All() for import lists in ImportListSyncService
  • f9b8d7720c412092026cb48b7d23f85b6e865951 New: Less logging when no import lists are enabled [ #4036 ]
  • e0eca252fc016802424b4a0edf8230ae3d183504 Automated API Docs update [skip ci]
  • 1efb069c6dc6042cbfa61e0d02278c15e71adbce Add info box to Remote Path Mappings Settings [ #4035 ]
  • 319ea66705c06de3e0fad0711267c613da43090b Fixed: Allow decimals for Custom Format size [ #4039 ]
  • 65cdbeb41ea3d4b7d93eb61f4d07aa7ec1ba886f New: Success check mark on blue buttons is now white instead of green
  • 4bb3bfad792f423a2de5f0d078c422487ab3dd29 Fixed: Ignore IOException deleting download folder after import
  • cfea62749d056579bfe350e19a3652bb2b466b64 New: Status message when downloading metadata in qBittorrent
  • ee644485694540767d63407ce03575eb8d02bc1e Fix flaky automation tests

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 1.4.5.3639
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 6a2e3c9c8482d2d0484f39dc4d996295870ca04d Fixed Plex Library Updates [ #2757 ]
  • 8453531a51a339afde0f3cefc489f2d0e6f7891e Fixed: Fallback to English translations if invalid UI language in config [ #4086 ]
  • fb21dd0f196aa653f3c89dc9c7b53e33487b0ad8 Fixed: Duplicate notifications for failed health checks
  • 20e1a6e41c97ef1726a1a2ed592ee7d211dd5a20 Fixed: Showing Grab ID in history details modal [ #4088 ]
  • 2bfc6ae5d6c3cf5b6f255849dcd1a3d1f2a02bc1 Fixed: Completed downloads in Qbit missing import path [ #4162 ]
  • 269ea5597ffc73ba23779d511289c4fd9e46e2e0 Fixed: qBittorent history retention to allow at least 14 days seeding
  • 4fc2cd5e6e8bc6ac60b4c2c188a3531d0dc5960e Bump version to 1.4.5
  • f5bbf21d724a8d8654e397adb5e195ce37772474 Fixed: Only apply remote path mappings for completed items in Qbit
  • 3a494c6040c61fca5250a60c89c28bccc9b20491 Fixed: SABnzbd history retention to allow at least 14 days
  • 4fc95a7fb4526d727a89b044830711f151e57cd2 Avoid returning null in static resource mapper Task
  • 7941ca58a5b20960fb6f71123e550e72ab19081b Rename Episode to Track in namespaces
  • 55c65d3d3d01ff45763e7d1610baa1c1ca49be24 Fixed: UTC time sent to UI for already imported message [ #3285 ]
  • 44824df7e4d99e04991442ed618322a9b400fb30 Check for empty description as well in ParseQuality
  • 44add0d884aa1a509bf132fa0d2cde98c318ec41 Preserve the protocol for fanart images [ #4145 ]
  • 6e479235cba9e96276059a1d17c1f015dc1e152f Fixed: Skip parsing releases without title
  • 00ba296b283e1028846cb9ae3b3ac7b35ec374a6 Add health check for dl clients removing completed downloads + enable for sab and qbit [ #4138 ]
  • 5f53282e51a2686aabefde334dabdefd73ced814 New: Don't treat 400 responses from Notifiarr as errors [ #4137 ]
  • f620f92cad33588c48ee679cfb4364ede724cc91 Log request failures in Notifiarr
  • 70fb57fc8339df95e89a188f74b3960ff7a88560 Fixed: Skip free space check only applies during import [ #4134 ]
  • 13b3555d2521bceba59133567da304fe446a65f0 Fixed: Don't try to create metadata images if source files doesn't exist [ #4132 ]
  • 3a740290359e0f669d4b705fb269d073ad828211 Preserve the protocol in Artist Image [ #4141 ]
  • 6c3473079621522a4e9319804b043c0d187d3c21 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • a445747c4dd4904ce490772d193395e61df3ee11 Fixed: Show correct error on unauthorized caps call
  • 5d3ff26703e3fcc3646d58353c26d4808ae789e5 Fixed: Don't allow quality profile to be created without all qualities
  • 0037a56c2b74644f24449d2300a826a0a1e15b23 Use async requests for media cover proxy [ #4126 ]
  • febf4b26a1fb8dd7149aa9b512f483b83e0dd5c2 Use await on reading the response content [ #4127 ]
  • 780420e799a804a7169bee29c11d074bd4ff8671 Log exceptions for failed fetches in Custom and Sonarr import lists
  • d8ed41f5e88ee4e404b7d386d40be1eb1a69a8d8 Bump version to 1.4.4
  • 197a59639bbdabeb91d7b7274ae4cf72e8f393a2 Fixed: Ignore inaccessible mount points
  • ce99ec6e64a60cc569d850e20501f66d1735a8ea Sonarr > Lidarr
  • b94df9f714d388dde489117086dc0f8cc26a340f New: Pushcut notifications [ #4113 ]
  • 404c888cca86a961139c827eac2cb847623c0acc Fixed parsing of multiple languages from Newznab indexer releases [ #4114 ]
  • 9b2aef2ca2025e1a7d21c1850829694d3df2f42b Fix executing migration 072 on Postgres [ #4109 ]
  • 0a1ea0019daf1cfb2fb069177a9de13091af1260 New: Add ALAC 24bit
  • 11e94936844b11d0cce62a39c22f7bf24fc01656 Add types/react-lazyload
  • 26947268addc1a40aa81009031522ea808735eef Bump version to 1.4.3
  • d6fde0934ea38f0037f0ebd36ce8a20ce96c199c Fixed: macOS version detection [ #4106 ]
  • 380bd42b042ee845b446e3e5f3a8daf5145a89dd Fixed: Calculating seed time for qBittorrent
  • 395b38d9cb95d738bc93db3b7d606bb2c48d1860 Use not allowed cursor for disabled select options
  • baa0e17ac6a3e22539bb12ceee8a6c57f4514937 Fixed: Execute Remote Path Mapping Check on failed track import
  • a3cfb52c6a30d98aa4fab3c17af3065947101446 Migrate to merged proposals now included in babel/present-env
  • 9d5d112e7acd0d5786c13365ece0bd79071ea94b Bump dotnet to 6.0.21
  • af5cb6cf75fda3bfdcb8e96290fc697d17bb01d7 Bump version to 1.4.2
  • e3a2aa4d839a6a5e04f68935b5c649c1069f239b Fixed: Increase timeout when downloading updates
  • b688f3ad0bde231798fb6cd3c6a5c9ecfe9c11bd Add info box under health messages [ #4073 ]
  • e2fd830059eec97db79c5613f0da41a839a81193 Improved http timeout handling
  • 882830fa6806f057f9704f0652e177b5f87a2e32 Bump version to 1.4.1
  • 1455238520ce7521b515fc95990cdf5709ced68f Fixed: Error trying to notify user when process not UserInteractive [ #3955 ]
  • 4ce8d388098bcc2130059b008e97462e63f6e581 Improve logging when processing files for import [ #3089 ]
  • e3bc824dc1dc163821747ff8bde2a0dd2796d18f New: Natural Sorting Manual Import Paths [ #2751 ]

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.0.7.3849
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.1.7.4030
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.
